title: How to Log Out of Netflix on Wii

methods.name: Logging Out on the Nintendo Wii

steps.headline: Power on the Nintendo Wii, or press the Home button on your Wii Remote if you are already using it.
Click the "Wii" button in the lower-left corner of the Home screen.
Select "Netflix Channel" from the list of items.
steps.description: It has a small "N" Netflix logo.

steps.headline: Select "Erase" and then confirm the deletion.
Return to the Home screen by repeatedly selecting "Back," or by pressing the Home button.
Login with the account you want to use.
Login to the Netflix website on your computer.
steps.description: Sign in using your Netflix account credentials.

steps.headline: Click the "Sign out of all devices" link.
Confirm that you want to sign out.
steps.description: All of your connected devices will be logged out, but it may take up to 8 hours for the log out to process on all of them.

methods.name: Logging Out on the Nintendo Wii U

steps.headline: Open the Netflix app on your Nintendo Wii U.
Select "Sign out" or "Deactivate."
steps.description: The option you receive varies depending on how you logged in originally.

steps.headline: Sign in with the account you want to use.

text: Logging Out on the Nintendo Wii Power on the Nintendo Wii, or press the Home button on your Wii Remote if you are already using it.  Click the "Wii" button in the lower-left corner of the Home screen.  Select "Data Management."  Select "Save Data" and then "Wii."  Select "Netflix Channel" from the list of items. It has a small "N" Netflix logo. Select "Erase" and then confirm the deletion.  Return to the Home screen by repeatedly selecting "Back," or by pressing the Home button.  Select the Netflix channel.  Select "Member sign in."  Login with the account you want to use.  Logging Out on All Devices Login to the Netflix website on your computer. Sign in using your Netflix account credentials. Click the "Sign out of all devices" link.  Confirm that you want to sign out. All of your connected devices will be logged out, but it may take up to 8 hours for the log out to process on all of them. Logging Out on the Nintendo Wii U Open the Netflix app on your Nintendo Wii U.  Use the Gamepad and press .↑↑↓↓←→←→↑↑↑↑.  Select "Sign out" or "Deactivate." The option you receive varies depending on how you logged in originally. Sign in with the account you want to use.
